rationales.self_direction: Strongly stimulation-aligned: restless with routine sequencing work, drawn to VR/neural mapping and Costa Rica fieldwork, 'feet literally itching' for travel. Self-direction shown in questioning whether to follow own path. Security and conformity negative as he's considering destabilizing his position despite peer advice.

rationales.stimulation: High stimulation: brain wanders to flights, pottery, surfing; can't focus on one thing. Achievement negative: no thesis direction, may not finish PhD. Security negative: no stable plan. Conformity negative: failing to meet expectations. Benevolence negative: acknowledges disappointing mother.

rationales.self_direction: Security strongly negative: contemplating major upheaval, no savings, uncertain future, explicitly listing destabilizing facts. Tradition negative: going against family expectations of PhD. Benevolence negative: lied to mother, calls himself 'terrible son'. Self-direction and stimulation positive: considering major autonomous decision for novelty.

rationales.self_direction: Decisive action taken. Self-direction and stimulation strongly positive: made autonomous decision to pursue major novelty. Security strongly negative: took the leap into uncertainty, leaving stable PhD. Brief entry but clear action. No nudge response provided.

Tradition negative: breaking from expected PhD path. Benevolence positive: honest conversations with Sharma, parents, Aditya; received and gave support.

rationales.self_direction: Self-direction: compassion for past and present self making autonomous choices. Stimulation: moving forward with change to Singapore. Tradition negative: abandoning past commitment from undergrad journal, shifting identity away from PhD completion.

rationales.self_direction: Strong self-direction: 'uncertainty doesn't go away by thinking harder - you have to actually live through the thing'; confident in own autonomous reasoning despite others questioning. Stimulation: 'whatever Singapore is, at least it'll be something different'. Security negative: explicitly choosing uncertainty over 'slow suffocation' of staying.
